page.title: 08Transport The car
page.content: The car is the most popular means of transport. There are approximately 30 to 40 different types of car. Cars run on petrol which is graded in 3 ratings. These are 2,3 or 4 star. Four being the highest grade. Cars are manufactured in several large factories throughout the country and are than sold through thousands of garage outlets. They are made in different shapes, sizes and colours with seating capacities from 1 to 7 persons. The engines sizes vary from 500 to 3500 cubic centimetres. The smaller engined cars travel at up to 70 mph and cover a distance of 60 miles per gallon. The larger engined cars may travel at up to 150 mph but only cover a distance of 20 mpg. There are two petrol filling stations and two car repair workshops in our area.
